data.title: Dina Merrill
data.meta_description: Dina Merrill (b. December 29, 1923 – d.May 22, 2017) portrayed Calamity Jan on the series Batman. At the time she appeared on the show, she was married to Cliff Robertson. Pictured: Dina Merrill as Calamity Jan from the Batman episode "The Great Train Robbery" Dina Merrill at IMDb Dina Merrill...
data.text:
Dina Merrill (b. December 29, 1923 – d.May 22, 2017) portrayed Calamity Jan on the series Batman. At the time she appeared on the show, she was married to Cliff Robertson.

Pictured: Dina Merrill as Calamity Jan from the Batman episode "The Great Train Robbery"

Work History

Acting Credits

Batman 1966-1968 Calamity Jan "Penguin's Clean Sweep" January 25, 1968 Calamity Jan "The Great Escape" February 1, 1968 Calamity Jan "The Great Train Robbery" February 8, 1968 Calamity Jan
